comments.text:
Religion, defined:

"Many linguists believe, as did Cicero, that the word “religion” derives 
not from “religare” (to bind or bond) but from “relegare” (to contemplate; 
to reread).  In this sense, religion is not what binds people together but 
rather what is contemplated or reread - namely myths, founding texts, 
teachings ( = Torah in Hebrew), a body of language (Veda in Sanskrit), a 
book (biblia in Greek) a reading or recitation (Quran in Arabic), a law 
(dharma in Sanskrit), a set of principles or commandments (the Decalogue in 
the Old Testament) - in a word, a revelation or tradition that is at once 
time ancient yet still relevant, accepted, respected, interiorized, both 
individually and communally.  

     This is where the two possible etymologies can converge: re-reading 
the same texts, even individually, binds people together.  Etymologically, 
religions owes less to sociology than to philology.  Religion is the love 
of the Word, the Law or the Book - a love of Logos.”  (pg. 19-20, L'Esprit 
de l’athéisme, 2006)

divorce her" (Deuteronomy 22:28-29 NLT).
"If within the city a man comes upon a maiden who is betrothed, and has 
relations with her, you shall bring them both out of the gate of the city 
and there stone them to death: the girl because she did not cry out for 
help though she was in the city, and the man because he violated his 
neighbors wife" (Deuteronomy 22:23-24 NAB).

Murder in the Bible:
Kill women who are not virgins on their wedding night.
Kill fortune tellers " A man or a woman who acts as a medium or 
fortuneteller shall be put to death by stoning; they have no one but 
themselves to blame for their death" (Leviticus 20:27 NAB).
Kill gay people who have sex.
Kill children who curse their parents. "All who curse their father or 
mother must be put to death.  They are guilty of a capital offense" 
(Leviticus 20:9 NLT).
 Stone to death adulterers.
Stone to death fornicators (those who have sex without being married).
Kill Witches "You should not let a sorceress live" (Exodus 22:17 NAB).
And on and on and on. Go and read the bible. It doesn't belong in the 
civilized world.
